articles.title: Elon Musk: Twitter says parts of source code leaked online - BBC
articles.description: Elon Musk has also reportedly indicated Twitter is now worth less than half the amount he paid for it.
articles.content:
Parts of the source code which underpins multi-billionaire Elon Musk's social media platform have been leaked online, Twitter says.
It says the code was posted on GitHub, a Microsoft-owned service w… [+1703 chars]

articles.title: Our Swan Song Has Come — Twitter Has Set A Date To End Legacy Verification - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: Alexa, play Green Day’s “Good Riddance (Time Of Your Life).”
articles.content: Twitter has officially announced that they will be removing all legacy verifications starting April 1, requiring all public figures and celebrities to subscribe to Twitter Blue in order to keep their… [+601 chars]
